channel.title: Comments on: Modify a Power View Data Source
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Koen Verbeeck
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.description: Hi Orlando, thanks for reading. I will be doing a blog post series on setting up a SharePoint 2013 BI demo environment. I still have to start writing, so I hope I can make it in time so you can benefit from it :)
item.content:encoded: Hi Orlando, thanks for reading. I will be doing a blog post series on setting up a SharePoint 2013 BI demo environment. I still have to start writing, so I hope I can make it in time so you can benefit from it ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Orlando Colamatteo
item.dc:creator: Orlando Colamatteo
item.description: Thanks for the post Koen. I am about to embark on a proof-of-concept project setting up a new SharePoint 2013 instance and getting PowerView going at a client site. I am looking forward to future posts.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the post Koen. I am about to embark on a proof-of-concept project setting up a new SharePoint 2013 instance and getting PowerView going at a client site. I am looking forward to future posts.
